label: Foundation of Identity
description: The implementation of the core character management systems, including state, inventory, and visual equipment.

label: Birth of the RealmSmith
description: Introduction of the RealmSmith town generation system, enabling deterministic procedural villages.

label: The Tactical Crucible
description: A massive overhaul of the combat system, introducing smart AI, turn management, and tactical grid visuals.

label: Narrative Threads & Persistence
description: The introduction of quest tracking, persistent save games, and the notification system.

label: The Cartographer's Vision
description: The expansion of spatial tools, including the first minimap and interactive pan/zoom world map.

label: The Hero's Journey
description: The shift towards character depth, introducing the Feat Selection system and the first AI lore integration.

label: Growth & Gain
description: Completion of the core RPG loop by wiring combat results to character experience and rewards.

label: Stable Realities
description: Infrastructure for managing multiple save states and the introduction of the first Main Menu.

label: The Biological Baseline
description: Consolidation of race data into a strictly typed and validated architecture.

label: The Agentic Protocol
description: The formalization of the Gemini/Jules collaborative workflow and AI monitoring tools.

label: Spell System Renaissance
description: The birth of the data-driven spell system, introducing AI arbitration and the V2 schema.

label: PixiJS Vanguard
description: Transitioning the submap renderer from React DOM to PixiJS for high-performance spatial simulation.

label: The Great Spell Migration
description: A massive data campaign moving over 100 spells into the modular V2 schema, guided by multiple specialized AI agents.

label: Deployment of the Primes
description: The formalization of the first AI personas: Vanguard (Combat), Vector (Geometry), Warden (Security), and Weaver (Lore).

label: The Web of Influence
description: Implementation of the Faction and Reputation system, allowing for public and secret standings with world powers.

label: Shadows & Heat
description: The introduction of the Notoriety system, crime tracking, and local/global heat mechanics.

label: The Living Market
description: Dynamic economy simulation with market events, regional pricing, and merchant interactions.

label: High Seas Core
description: Foundational systems for naval travel, including ship types and crew management.

label: Chronos & Cosmos
description: Integration of the dynamic calendar system, seasonal cycles, and time-of-day impacts on gameplay.

label: The Divine Gaze
description: The introduction of the core Religion system, Deities, and Divine Favor mechanics.

label: Wanderer's Fortune
description: Procedural travel event system, enabling random encounters and landmarks during world exploration.

label: Planes of Despair
description: Implementation of Shadowfell despair mechanics and the foundational Portal system for planar travel.

label: Secrets & Identities
description: Core Identity and Secret systems, allowing for character disguises and hidden world lore.

label: Companion Bonds
description: The reaction system for companions, enabling them to respond dynamically to player choices and world events.

label: The Clockwork World
description: Introduction of complex world mechanics including pressure plates, puzzles, and object interactions.

label: Forges & Weather
description: Foundational crafting system and the introduction of dynamic mechanical weather patterns.
